mapper.insert: insert into spot_Theme ( theme_no as "themeNo", spot_no as "spotNo") values(#{themeNo}, #{spotNo})
mapper.select: SELECT s.spot_no AS "spotNo", s.spot_latitude AS "latitude", s.spot_longitude AS "longitude", t.theme_no AS "themeNo" FROM spot_theme as t, spot as s WHERE t.spot_no = s.spot_no AND s.city_no = #{value}
